title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a refundable credit for certain education expenses.
content: Educational Opportunity for All Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a refundable tax credit for qualfied tuition expenses. Defines qualified tuition expenses as tuition required for the enrollment of the taxpayer, the taxpayer's spouse or dependents at an institution of higher learning. Limits the annual amount of such credit to $4,000 per student.
